name: Hot Cheesy Corn Dip
description: A super easy and amazingly creamy corn dip that comes together with just 10 min prep. And it’s even made “skinny” with Greek yogurt!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups corn kernels (frozen, canned or roasted)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly coat a 9-inch baking dish with nonstick spray.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly coat a 9-inch baking dish with nonstick spray.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine corn, chiles, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, cilantro, garlic powder, onion powder and oregano; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine corn, chiles, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, cilantro, garlic powder, onion powder and oregano; season with salt and pepper, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread corn mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread corn mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Place into oven and bake until bubbly around the edges, about 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place into oven and bake until bubbly around the edges, about 20-25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with tomato, green onion and cilantro, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with tomato, green onion and cilantro, if desired.
